title: Marcelo, Marmelo, Martelo
overview: The adventures of a different boy who has his own way of talking, thinking and dressing. His peculiar style and creativity in inventing words help him win over the three best friends in the Caramelo neighborhood: Catapimba, the fastest football player; Teresinha, a very organized girl; and Gabriela, who is super smart and has the most powerful kick in the neighborhood.Â
